players.name: Eshika
players.title: The Social Glue
players.relationship: Ayaan used me to access people/circles.

players.secret: You saw '6:10' on Ayaan's screen earlier.

players.name: Shubham
players.title: The Protective Boyfriend
players.relationship: Ayaan hovered around Eshika.
players.whatHappened: I warned Ayaan to stop being weird. He smirked.
players.secret: 'If you mess with her, you'll regret it.' Sounds bad.
players.witnessMemory: ~6:15–6:18 Sai was with you. You saw Justin pass near snacks toward hallway/stairs ~6:16.

players.name: Shubhi
players.title: The One With History
players.relationship: Ayaan knew old roommate drama.

players.witnessMemory: ~6:14–6:18 Somya + Trisha were in couch area with you.

players.name: Karishma

players.relationship: I knew Ayaan manipulated people.

players.secret: You were tracking who left conversations.

players.witnessMemory: ~6:15–6:18 saw Akshay near stairs/hallway; saw Jowel near speaker briefly.

players.witnessMemory: ~6:15–6:17 saw Karishma by stairs. ~6:16 Mariah nearby.

players.name: Mariah

players.name: Ashwini

players.name: Akshay

players.whatHappened: He got annoyed I rejected him.
players.secret: Noticed a small metallic thing on floor earlier, didn't pick up.
players.witnessMemory: ~6:15–6:18 saw Shibani near music/speaker (can confirm her). With Ashwini near stairs.

players.name: Sai
players.title: The Mediator
players.relationship: Ayaan wanted me to smooth drama.
players.whatHappened: He said 'Then you'll be sorry.'

players.name: Sanjana
players.title: The Avoider
players.relationship: Ayaan tried to get me alone.
players.whatHappened: He asked for private talk; I avoided him.
players.secret: Ayaan tried to set a time with you earlier; you ignored.

players.witnessMemory: ~6:12–6:14 saw Eshika upstairs. Saw Sai pass upstairs briefly ~6:13.

players.name: Saachi

players.relationship: Ayaan hinted something big was coming.
players.whatHappened: 'Tonight I settle this.'
players.secret: Earlier noticed a distinctive keychain charm on someone's keys. (Don't name them yet.)
players.witnessMemory: ~6:15 saw Eshika upstairs near cups.

players.name: Trishta
players.title: The Peacemaker
players.relationship: Told Ayaan to stop poisoning vibe.
players.whatHappened: He said 'people deserve consequences.'

players.name: Kriti
players.title: The Anxious One

players.whatHappened: Panicked; told Aniketh.

players.name: Aniketh
players.title: The Loyal Boyfriend
players.relationship: Ayaan stressed Kriti; I confronted him.
players.whatHappened: 'Back off.' He said 'make me.'
players.secret: You hated him enough people might assume the worst.
players.witnessMemory: ~6:12–6:19 stayed with Kriti (confirm). Saw Trishta pass ~6:16.

players.name: Sana
players.title: The Blunt Friend

players.witnessMemory: ~6:15–6:17 saw Eshika upstairs by cups (confirm). Saw Sanjana upstairs earlier.

players.name: Somya

players.witnessMemory: ~6:14–6:18 Shubhi in couch area (confirm). Trisha there too.

players.witnessMemory: ~6:14–6:18 saw Shubhi and Somya (confirm). Saw Justin earlier, not sure at 6:17.

players.name: Samaksh

players.relationship: Ayaan tried to pull me into drama.
players.whatHappened: 'You could ruin someone with a story.'

players.fingerPointHook: Karishma acts like she's steering the room.
players.witnessMemory: ~6:16–6:18 saw Hitayu return (confirm). Saw Justin later acting normal.

players.name: Krish

players.relationship: Ayaan dared me into drama.
players.whatHappened: Left convo abruptly, annoyed.
players.secret: You were near storage around ~6:12 but left.
players.fingerPointHook: Someone might try to pin their timeline on you.
players.witnessMemory: Around ~6:20 saw Justin back in main area. Remember Sai/Shubham near snacks ~6:16, but you weren't with them the whole time.

players.name: Justin
players.title: Mo Friend
players.relationship: Ayaan was weird/pushy with people.
players.whatHappened: Ayaan acted like he had leverage over multiple people.
players.alibi: I was bouncing between the main area and water/snacks. I remember seeing Krish around there.
players.secret: You had a private conversation with Ayaan earlier.
players.fingerPointHook: Push suspicion toward Shubham, Aniketh, or Kriti.
players.witnessMemory: You remember seeing Sai and Shubham near snacks ~6:16, and hearing the music change around ~6:17.

privateAddons.name: Karishma
privateAddons.power: Your final vote counts as 2 votes.
privateAddons.seed: Ayaan wrote: 'Samaksh knows. If he talks, I'm done.' You also noticed Samaksh near storage hallway around ~6:12.

privateAddons.name: Samaksh
privateAddons.power: Your final vote counts as 2 votes.
privateAddons.seed: You saw Ayaan's phone open earlier: draft message to Karishma: 'Stop acting like you run this— I have your receipts too.' You also saw Karishma near stairs around ~6:15.
privateAddons.mission: Build trust without revealing you're detective.

privateAddons.name: Justin
privateAddons.whatReallyHappened: You lured Ayaan to storage at 6:10. It escalated. Your bear keychain charm snapped during the struggle.
privateAddons.publicApproach: Stay casual. Don't cling to one witness.
privateAddons.deflect: Push gloves/duct tape receipt + Shubham/Aniketh motives.
